name: CreateJobOpening
description:
Create a new job opening in the system.

Use this tool to create a new job opening. Requires 'jobsWrite' permission. For setting custom fields, use the 'customFields.setValue' endpoint.

parameters.name: identifiers
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of jobIds, targetHireDate, targetStartDate, isBackfill, and employmentType to define job details.

parameters.name: job_description
parameters.description: A detailed description of the job opening, including responsibilities and qualifications.

parameters.name: department_team_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the department or team associated with the job opening.

value_schema.description: The id of the department or team associated with the opening.

parameters.name: location_ids
parameters.description: A list of location IDs associated with the job opening.

value_schema.description: The ids of the locations associated with the opening.

parameters.name: associated_job_ids
parameters.description: Array of job IDs related to the opening.

value_schema.description: The ids of the jobs associated with the opening

parameters.name: target_hire_date
parameters.description: Specify the date (YYYY-MM-DD) by which the hire is intended to be made for the job opening.

value_schema.description: The date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) by which you intend to hire against this opening.

parameters.name: employment_start_date
parameters.description: The date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) when the hired person is expected to start employment.

value_schema.description: The date (in YYYY-MM-DD format) by which you intend someone hired against this opening will start employment.

parameters.name: employment_type
parameters.description: The employment type for this opening. Options include: FullTime, PartTime, Intern, Contract, Temporary.

value_schema.description: The employment type for this opening

parameters.name: opening_state
parameters.description: Specifies the state of the job opening. Options: Draft, Approved, Open, Closed. Defaults to Draft. Additional validation may be needed if not Draft.

value_schema.description: The state the opening should be created in. Defaults to `Draft`. If not Draft, additional validation will be performed.

parameters.name: is_backfill
parameters.description: Indicate whether the job opening is intended to backfill a previous employee's position.

value_schema.description: Whether this opening is intended to backfill a previous employee
